item.title: Monocular Visual Odometry on Blimp Platform
Distributed Image Processing in Cloud Dataproc
item.description: Github Link: https://github.com/yilun306/Distributed-Image-Processing-in-Cloud-Dataproc GCP VM Setup Make sure Editor role is enabled for the developer account Setup VM in Compute Engine > VM Instances > Create. Choose Series N1, 2 vCPUs (n1-standard-2 instance) as Machine Type, and allow full access to all Cloud APIs. Click create, and access the console using the SSH button. Install Software Set up Scala and sbt sudo apt-get install -y dirmngr unzip sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y apt-transport-https echo "deb https://dl.

item.title: First, a little bit fun facts about me.
item.description: I’m a fully vaccinated personnel right now. Had my first/last shot of Janssen on April 2nd. You’re safe to continue browing without a mask. I have a Bachalor Degree in Computer Engineering from Georgia Tech, because my retarded brain couldn’t decide between CS and EE. I like the Stonk! BuuuuuuT Do NOT hold GME like I did :(
